messages.content: You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
FUTA?
Federal University of Technology Akure
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Where is Futa located?
FUTA is situated in Akure, Ondo State, in the southwestern part of Nigeria
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
When will FUTA Admission start?
FUTA admission usually starts after the release of JAMB results. Keep an eye on the official website for the specific dates.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
When is FUTA Screening exam starting
FUTA’s screening exam dates are typically announced a few weeks after the admission portal opens. Check the school’s website for updates.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
How many departments and faculties are in the school?
FUTA has 9 faculties and over 50 departments, covering various disciplines in science, technology, and engineering.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
When is FUTA releasing the next admission list
The next admission list will be released 3 weeks to the resumption date
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
What are the list of courses offered in FUTA?

The list of courses offerd in FUTA are; Agricultural Engineering, Agricultural Extension and Communication Technology, Animal Production and Health, Applied Geology, Applied Geophysics, Architecture, Bio-medical Technology, Biochemistry, Biology, Biotechnology, Building, Civil Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Crop, Soil And Pest Management, Eco-Tourism and Wildlife Management, Electrical / Electronics Engineering, Estate Management, Fisheries And Aquaculture Technology, Food Science and Technology, Forestry and Wood Technology, Human Anatomy, Industrial And Production Engineering, Industrial Chemistry,Industrial Design, Industrial Mathematics, Information Systems, Information Technology, Marine Science And Technology, Mathematics, Mechanical Engineering, Metallurgical and Material Engineering, Meteorology, Microbiology, Mining Engineering, Physics, Physiology, Quantity Surveying, Remote Sensing And Geosciences Information System, Software Engineering, Statistics, Surveying and Geo-Informatics, Urban and Regional Planning, Information And Communication Technology, Information Technology, Agriculture and Resource Economics, Cyber Security
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
faculties in FUTA

The faculties in FUTA are; School of Agriculture and Agriculture Technology (SAAT), School of Engineering and Engineering Technology (SEET), School of Earth and Minerals (SEMS), School of Computing (SOC), School of Environmmental Technology (SET), School of Health and Health Technology(SHHT), School of life Sciences (SLS), School of Physical Sciences (SPS), School of Basic Medical Sciences (SBMS), School of Logistic Technology (SLT), School of Management Technology (SMAT)
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Open hours of FUTA?
Futa is opened 24hrs
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Vice Chancellor
The name of the current FUTA Chancellor is Prof. Adenike Oladiji
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
What is Jamb cut off Mark?
Jamb cut off mark for FUTA Admission is 190.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
What are the general admission requirements for undergraduate programs at FUTA?

FUTA requires at least five credits in O'level results including Mathematics, English, and three other relevant subjects. The credits must be obtained in not more than two sittings. Additionally, candidates must meet the JAMB UTME cut-off mark for the year.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
How do I apply for admission to FUTA?

To apply for admission, you must first sit for the JAMB UTME and choose FUTA as your preferred institution. After meeting the cut-off mark, you will need to participate in the FUTA Post-UTME screening exercise, which includes filling out the application form on the FUTA website.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
What is the deadline for FUTA Post-UTME application?
The deadline varies each year. It's best to keep an eye on FUTA’s official website or follow their updates on social media for the most accurate information.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
How can I check if I have been offered admission into FUTA?
You can check your admission status on the JAMB CAPS portal or the FUTA admission portal using your JAMB registration number.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Does FUTA offer Medicine or Law?
FUTA is primarily focused on technology, engineering, and science-related courses. But, medicine has just been added as part of the courses offered in FUTA. It does not offer Law.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
What are the most competitive courses at FUTA?
Some of the most competitive courses include Computer Science, Electrical/Electronic Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Architecture.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Can I change my course after being admitted?
Yes, you may be allowed to change your course after admission, but it depends on the availability of space and the department's criteria.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
What are the school fees for undergraduate programs at FUTA?

School fees vary based on the department and whether the student is a fresh or returning student. Typically, fresh students pay around ₦50,000–₦60,000, while returning students pay slightly lower amounts.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
How do I pay my school fees at FUTA?
School fees can be paid online through the FUTA student portal using a debit card, or through bank transfer at designated banks.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Are there scholarships available for FUTA students?

Yes, there are scholarships available for FUTA students, including government-funded scholarships like PTDF, NNPC, and several private sector grants. Information on applying can be found on the school’s website.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
What is the process of applying for accommodation at FUTA?
Students can apply for accommodation by logging into the student portal and selecting the accommodation option. Allocation is usually done on a first-come, first-served basis.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Does FUTA provide accommodation for students?
Yes, FUTA has several halls of residence for both male and female students, though space is limited. Students are advised to apply for accommodation early.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
When does the academic session start at FUTA?
The academic session typically starts in October, but the exact date may vary depending on the academic calendar released by the school each year.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
How do I retrieve my login details for the student portal if I forget them?
If you forget your login details, you can retrieve them by clicking on the Forgot Password option on the student portal, or by contacting the ICT department for further assistance.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
Does FUTA have any special admission considerations for international students?

Yes, FUTA accepts international students, and they must meet the same academic criteria as domestic students. Additionally, international students must provide proof of English language proficiency and other relevant documents.
You are a chatbot that answers factual questions related to the Federal University of Technology Akure Admission Enquiry.
FUTA Hall of residences?

Here are the names of FUTA Hall of residences: MALE: Akintunde Hall, Fajuyi Hall, Abiola Hall, T. I. Francis Hall, Akindeko Hall, Jadesola Akande Hall. FEMALE: Oba Kehinde Hall, Olufunmilayo Ransome-Kuti Hall, Queen Amina Hall, Annex Female Hall, Jibowu Hall.
